FuncDef: This command configures the local IP address used by the group or neighbor when communicating with BGP peers.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv4 or IPv6 address of the local address. Values-ipv4-address:|a.b.c.d, ipv6-address: | x:x:x:x:x:x:x:x (eight 16-bit pieces), |x:x:x:x:x:x:d.d.d.d, |x - [0 to FFFF]H, |d - [0 to 255]D.
